GK19meghdksu:2: aṅgenāṅgaṃ pratanu tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ Md_2.42a
GK19meghdksu:3: atyādityaṃ hutavahamukhe saṃbhṛtaṃ tad dhi teyaḥ Md_1.46d
GK19meghdksu:4: atrodbhrāntaḥ kila nalagiriḥ stambham utpāṭya darpād Md_1.34c
GK19meghdksu:5: adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃ svid ity unmukhībhir Md_1.14a
GK19meghdksu:7: antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau Md_1.3b
GK19meghdksu:9: antaḥ śuddhas tvam api bhavitā varṇamātreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ Md_1.52d
GK19meghdksu:10: antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ Md_1.20c
GK19meghdksu:13: apy anyasmiñ jaladhara mahākālam āsādya kāle Md_1.37a
GK19meghdksu:15: arcistuṅgān abhimukham api prāpya ratnapradīpān Md_2.7c
GK19meghdksu:17: arhasy enaṃ śamayitum alaṃ vāridhārāsahasrair Md_1.56c
GK19meghdksu:18: avyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ Md_2.41c
GK19meghdksu:20: asrais tāvan muhur upacitair dṛṣṭir ālupyate me Md_2.45c
GK19meghdksu:21: aṃsanyaste sati halabhṛto mecake vāsasīva Md_1.62d
GK19meghdksu:24: ātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvad icchāmi kartum Md_2.45b
GK19meghdksu:25: ādye baddhā virahadivase yā śikhā dāma hitvā Md_2.32a
GK19meghdksu:29: āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ Md_1.12a
GK19meghdksu:30: āmandrāṇāṃ phalam avikalaṃ lapsyase garjitānām Md_1.37d
GK19meghdksu:33: āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ Md_2.47c
GK19meghdksu:35: āloke te nipatati purā sā balivyākulā vā Md_2.25a
GK19meghdksu:37: āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ Md_1.9c
GK19meghdksu:40: āsāreṇa tvam api śamayes tasya naidāgham agniṃ Md_1.19ac
GK19meghdksu:43: itthaṃ cetaś caṭulanayane durlabhaprārthanaṃ me Md_2.48c
GK19meghdksu:44: itthaṃbhūtāṃ prathamavirahe tām ahaṃ tarkayāmi Md_2.34b
GK19meghdksu:45: ity ākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā Md_2.40a
GK19meghdksu:46: ity āgantūn ramayati jano yatra bandhūn abhijñaḥ Md_1.34d
GK19meghdksu:47: ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce Md_1.5c
GK19meghdksu:51: utpaśyāmi drutamapi sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ Md_1.23a
GK19meghdksu:53: utsaṅge vā malinavasane saumya nikṣipya vīṇāṃ Md_2.26a
GK19meghdksu:54: udgāyadbhir dhanapatiyaśaḥ kiṃnarair yatra sārdham Md_2.10b
GK19meghdksu:58: ekaṃ bhuktāguṇam iva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam Md_1.49d
GK19meghdksu:59: ekaḥ sakhyās tava saha mayā vāmapādābhilāṣī Md_2.18c
GK19meghdksu:60: ekaḥ sūte sakalam abalāmaṇḍanaṃ kalpavṛkṣaḥ Md_2.12d
GK19meghdksu:61: etasmān māṃ kuśalinam abhijñānadānād viditvā Md_2.52a
GK19meghdksu:62: ebhiḥ sādho hṛdayanihitair lakṣaṇair lakṣayethā Md_2.20a
GK19meghdksu:63: kaccit saumya vyavasitam idaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me Md_2.54a
GK19meghdksu:64: kaccid bhartuḥ smarasi rasike tvaṃ hi tasya priyeti Md_2.25d
GK19meghdksu:65: kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe Md_1.3d
GK19meghdksu:66: karṇe lolaḥ kathayitum abhūd ānanasparśalobhāt Md_2.43b
GK19meghdksu:67: kartuṃ yac ca prabhavati mahīm ucchilīndhrām avandhyāṃ Md_1.11a
GK19meghdksu:70: kasyātyantaṃ sukham upanataṃ duḥkham ekāntato vā Md_2.49c
GK19meghdksu:71: kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ Md_1.8c
GK19meghdksu:73: kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃcid ūnaḥ Md_2.40d
GK19meghdksu:75: kārśyaṃ yena tyajati vidhinā sa tvayaivopapādyaḥ Md_1.30d
GK19meghdksu:76: kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvete te Md_1.23b
GK19meghdksu:77: kāle kāle bhavati bhavato yasya saṃyogam etya Md_1.12c
GK19meghdksu:78: kiṃcit paścād vraja laghugatir bhūya evottareṇa Md_1.16d
GK19meghdksu:82: kṛtvā tāsām adhigamam apāṃ saumya sārasvatīnām Md_1.52c
GK19meghdksu:84: ke vā na syuḥ paribhavapadaṃ niṣphalārambhayatnāḥ Md_1.57d
GK19meghdksu:86: krīḍālolāḥ śravaṇaparuṣair garjitair bhāyayes tāḥ Md_1.64d
GK19meghdksu:89: krīḍāśaile yadi ca vicaret pādacāreṇa gaurī Md_1.63b
GK19meghdksu:90: krūras tasminn api na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ Md_2.45d
GK19meghdksu:91: kṣāmacchāyāṃ bhavanam adhunā madviyogena nūnaṃ Md_2.20c
GK19meghdksu:92: kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya Md_1.13d
GK19meghdksu:93: kṣetraṃ kṣatrapradhanapiśunaṃ kauravaṃ tad bhajethāḥ Md_1.51b
GK19meghdksu:96: khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śihariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra Md_1.13c
GK19meghdksu:97: gacchantīnāṃ ramāṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ tatra naktaṃ Md_1.40a
GK19meghdksu:103: gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā Md_1.25b
GK19meghdksu:104: gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ Md_1.7c
GK19meghdksu:105: gambhīrāyāḥ payasi saritaś cetasīva prasanne Md_1.43a
GK19meghdksu:107: gāḍhotkaṇṭhāṃ guruṣu divaseṣv eṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ Md_2.23c
GK19meghdksu:110: gharmānte 'smin vigaṇaya kathaṃ vāsarāṇi vrajeyur Md_2.45ac
GK19meghdksu:112: cūḍāpāśe navakuravakaṃ cāru karṇe śirīṣaṃ Md_2.2c
GK19meghdksu:114: chāyātmāpi prakṛtisubhago lapsyate te praveśam Md_1.43b
GK19meghdksu:116: jagdhvāraṇyeṣv adhikasurabhiṃ gandham āghrāya corvyāḥ Md_1.21c
GK19meghdksu:119: jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ vānyarūpām Md_2.23d
GK19meghdksu:120: jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ Md_1.6b
GK19meghdksu:121: jāne sakhyās tava mayi manaḥ saṃbhṛtasnehamasmād Md_2.34a
GK19meghdksu:125: jñātāsvādo vivṛtajaghanāṃ ko vihātuṃ samarthā Md_1.44d
GK19meghdksu:126: jyotirlekhāvalayi galitaṃ yasya barhaṃ bhavānī Md_1.47a
GK19meghdksu:128: tac chrutvā te śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ mānasotkāḥ Md_1.11b
GK19meghdksu:129: tatkalyāṇi tvam api nitarāṃ mā gamaḥ kātaratvam Md_2.49b
GK19meghdksu:130: tatra vyaktaṃ dṛṣadi caraṇanyāsam ardhendumauleḥ Md_1.58a
GK19meghdksu:135: tantrīm ārdrāṃ nayanasalilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃcid Md_2.26c
GK19meghdksu:136: tanmadhye ca sphaṭikaphalakā kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭir Md_2.19a
GK19meghdksu:138: tasmād asyāḥ kumudaviśadāny arhasi tvaṃ na dhairyān Md_1.43c
GK19meghdksu:140: tasmin kāle jalada yadi sā labdhanidrāsukhā syād Md_2.37a
GK19meghdksu:141: tasmin kāle nayanasaliaṃ yoṣitāṃ khaṇḍitānāṃ Md_1.42a
GK19meghdksu:142: tasminn adrau katicid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī Md_1.2a
GK19meghdksu:143: tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ kautukādhānahetor Md_1.3a
GK19meghdksu:144: tasyā eva prabhavam acalaṃ prāpya gauraṃ tuṣāraiḥ Md_1.55b
GK19meghdksu:146: tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir Md_1.20a
GK19meghdksu:147: tasyās tīre racitaśikharaḥ peśalair indranīlaiḥ Md_2.17a
GK19meghdksu:148: tasyāḥ kiṃcit karadhṛtam iva prāptvāīraśākhaṃ Md_1.44a
GK19meghdksu:149: tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni paścārdhalambī Md_1.54a
GK19meghdksu:150: tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthum api tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham Md_1.49b
GK19meghdksu:152: taṃ ced vāyau sarati saralaskandhasaṃghaṭṭajanmā Md_1.56a
GK19meghdksu:154: tābhyo mokṣas tava yadi sakhe gharmalabdhasya na syāt Md_1.64c
GK19meghdksu:155: tām āyuṣman mama ca vacanād ātmanaś copakartuṃ Md_2.41a
GK19meghdksu:159: tām evoṣṇair virahamahatīm aśrubhir yāpayantīm Md_2.29d
GK19meghdksu:160: tālaiḥ śiñjāvalayasubhagair nartitaḥ kāntayā me Md_2.19c
GK19meghdksu:162: tāṃ jānīthāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ Md_2.23a
GK19meghdksu:164: tuṅgena tvāṃ jalada śirasā vakṣyati ślāghamānaḥ Md_1.19ab
GK19meghdksu:165: tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ Md_1.6c
GK19meghdksu:166: tenodīcīṃ diśam anusares tiryag āyāmaśobhī Md_1.60c
GK19meghdksu:171: tvatsamparkāt pulakitam iva prauḍhapuṣpaiḥ kadambaiḥ Md_1.26b
GK19meghdksu:175: tvayy ādātuṃ jalam avanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure Md_1.49a
GK19meghdksu:176: tvayy āyantaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvikārān abhijñaiḥ Md_1.16a
GK19meghdksu:177: tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe Md_1.18b
GK19meghdksu:178: tvayy āsanne nayanam uparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā Md_2.35c
GK19meghdksu:180: tvaṃ ced acchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayes tiryag ambhaḥ Md_1.54b
GK19meghdksu:181: tvām apy asraṃ navajalamayaṃ mocayiṣyaty avaśyaṃ Md_2.33c
GK19meghdksu:183: tvām ālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiḥ śilāyām Md_2.45a
GK19meghdksu:184: tvām āsādya stanitasamaye mānayiṣyanti siddhāḥ Md_1.22c
GK19meghdksu:187: tvām utkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya sambhāvya caiva Md_2.40b
GK19meghdksu:191: dīrghīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ Md_1.32a
GK19meghdksu:193: dūrībhūtaṃ pratanum api māṃ pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti Md_2.45ab
GK19meghdksu:194: dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīm ivaikām Md_2.23b
GK19meghdksu:195: dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvaṃ mayeti Md_2.51d
GK19meghdksu:196: dṛṣṭe sūrye punarapi bhavān vāhayedadhvaśeṣaṃ Md_1.41c
GK19meghdksu:198: dṛṣṭvā yasyāṃ vipaṇiracitān vidrumāṇāṃ ca bhaṅgān Md_1.33c
GK19meghdksu:199: dvāropānte likhitavapuṣau śaṅkhapadmau ca dṛṣṭvā Md_2.20b
GK19meghdksu:200: dhārāpātais tvam iva kamalāny abhyavarṣan mukhāni Md_1.51d
GK19meghdksu:206: dhautāpāṅgaṃ haraśaśirucā pāvakes taṃ mayūraṃ Md_1.47c
GK19meghdksu:208: na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punar alakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin Md_1.66b
GK19meghdksu:209: nanv ātmānaṃ bahu vigaṇayann ātmanaivāvalambe Md_2.49a
GK19meghdksu:210: na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ Md_1.8d
GK19meghdksu:211: nādhyāsyanti vyapagataśucas tvām api prekṣya haṃsāḥ Md_2.16d
GK19meghdksu:212: nānāceṣṭair jaladalalitair nirviśes taṃ nagendram Md_1.65d
GK19meghdksu:216: nidrāṃ gatvā kim api rudatī sasvaraṃ viprabuddhā Md_2.51b
GK19meghdksu:217: nirvindhyāyāḥ pathi bhava rasābhyantaraḥ saṃnipatya Md_1.29c
GK19meghdksu:219: nirhrādas te muraja iva cet kandareṣu dhvaniḥ syāt Md_1.59c
GK19meghdksu:220: niḥśabdo 'pi pradiśasi jalaṃ yācitaś cātakebhyaḥ Md_2.54c
GK19meghdksu:223: nīcairākhyaṃ girim adhivases tatra viśrāmahetos Md_1.26a
GK19meghdksu:224: nīcair gacchaty upari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa Md_2.49d
GK19meghdksu:225: nīcair vāsyaty upajigamiṣor devapūrvaṃ giriṃ te Md_1.45c
GK19meghdksu:227: nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇa iva mayā sārdham icchāratair yā Md_2.29c
GK19meghdksu:228: nītā lodhraprasavarajasā pāṇḍutām ānane śrīḥ Md_2.2b
GK19meghdksu:231: nīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā haritakapiśaṃ kesarair ardharūḍhair Md_1.21a
GK19meghdksu:238: naiśo mārgaḥ savitur udaye sūcyate kāminīnām Md_2.11d
GK19meghdksu:242: paścād āvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tam ātmābhilāṣaṃ Md_2.50c
GK19meghdksu:244: paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ Md_2.46c
GK19meghdksu:250: puṇyaṃ yāyās tribhuvanaguror dhāma caṇḍīśvarasya Md_1.36b
GK19meghdksu:254: puṣpodbhedaṃ saha kisalayair bhūṣaṇānāṃ vikalpam Md_2.12b
GK19meghdksu:256: pūrvaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhaved aṅgam ebhis taveti Md_2.47d
GK19meghdksu:257: pūrvābhāṣyaṃ sulabhavipadāṃ prāṇinām etad eva Md_2.41d
GK19meghdksu:258: pūrvoddiṣṭām upasara purīṃ śrīviśālāṃ viśālām Md_1.31b
GK19meghdksu:259: pṛcchantī vā madhuravacanāṃ sārikāṃ pañjarasthāṃ Md_2.25c
GK19meghdksu:260: pratudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet Md_1.23d
GK19meghdksu:261: pratyakṣaṃ te nikhilam acirād bhrātar uktaṃ mayā yat Md_2.34d
GK19meghdksu:263: pratyādeśād api ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam Md_2.35b
GK19meghdksu:264: pratyādeśān na khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ kalpayāmi Md_2.54b
GK19meghdksu:266: pratyāśvastāṃ samam abhinavair jālakair mālatīnām Md_2.38b
GK19meghdksu:269: pratyuktaṃ hi praṇayiṣu satām īpsitārthakriyaiva Md_2.54d
GK19meghdksu:272: prasthānaṃ te katham api sakhe lambamānasya bhāvi Md_1.44c
GK19meghdksu:273: prācīmūle tanum iva kalāmātraśeṣāṃ himāṃśoḥ Md_2.29b
GK19meghdksu:275: prāpte mitre bhavati vimukhaḥ kiṃ punar yas tatthoccaiḥ Md_1.17d
GK19meghdksu:277: prāyaś cāpaṃ na vahati bhayān manmathaḥ ṣaṭpadajyam Md_2.14b
GK19meghdksu:278: prāyaḥ sarvo bhavati karuṇāvṛttir ārdrāntarātmā Md_2.33d
GK19meghdksu:280: prāleyādrer upataṭam atikramya tāṃs tān viśeṣān Md_1.60a
GK19meghdksu:281: prāleyāstraṃ kamalavadanāt so.api hartuṃ nalinyāḥ Md_1.42c
GK19meghdksu:282: prāsādās tvāṃ tulayitum alaṃ yatra tais tair viśeṣaiḥ Md_2.1d
GK19meghdksu:285: prekṣiṣyante gaganagatayo nūnam āvarjya dṛṣṭir Md_1.49c
GK19meghdksu:287: prekṣyopāntasphuritataḍitaṃ tvāṃ tam eva smarāmi Md_2.17d
GK19meghdksu:290: bandhuprītyā samaravimukho lāṅgalī yāḥ siṣeve Md_1.52b
GK19meghdksu:294: brahmāvartaṃ janapadam atha cchāyayā gāhamānaḥ Md_1.51a
GK19meghdksu:295: brūyā evaṃ tava sahacaro rāmagiryāśramasthaḥ Md_2.41b
GK19meghdksu:296: bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya Md_1.19d
GK19meghdksu:298: bhartur mitraṃ priyam avidhave viddhi mām ambuvāhaṃ Md_2.39a
GK19meghdksu:299: bhartuḥ kaṇṭhacchavir iti gaṇaiḥ sādaraṃ vīkṣyamāṇaḥ Md_1.36a
GK19meghdksu:301: bhūyaścāha tvam api śayane kaṇṭhalagnā purā me Md_2.51a
GK19meghdksu:302: bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayam api kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī Md_2.26d
GK19meghdksu:303: matvā devaṃ dhanapatisakhaṃ yatra sākṣād vasantaṃ Md_2.14a
GK19meghdksu:304: matsandeśaḥ sukhayitum alaṃ paśya sādhvīṃ niśīthe Md_2.28c
GK19meghdksu:306: matsādṛśyaṃ virahatanu vā bhāvagamyaṃ likhantī Md_2.25b
GK19meghdksu:307: madgehinyāḥ priya iti sakhe cetasā kātareṇa Md_2.17c
GK19meghdksu:310: madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ Md_1.18d
GK19meghdksu:311: mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ Md_1.10a
GK19meghdksu:316: margaṃ tāvac chṛṇu kathayatas tvatprayāṇānurūpaṃ Md_1.13a
GK19meghdksu:317: mā kaulīnād asitanayane mayy aviśvāsinī bhūḥ Md_2.52b
GK19meghdksu:318: mā bhūd asyāḥ praṇayini mayi svapnalabdhe kathaṃcit Md_2.37c
GK19meghdksu:324: muktādhvānaṃ sapadi śarabhā laṅghayeyur bhavantam Md_1.57b
GK19meghdksu:327: meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ Md_1.3c
GK19meghdksu:331: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānim aṅgānukūlaḥ Md_1.32c
GK19meghdksu:333: yasmin dṛṣṭe karaṇavigamād ūrdhvam uddhūtapāpāḥ Md_1.58c
GK19meghdksu:334: yasyās toye kṛtavasatayo mānasaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ Md_2.16c
GK19meghdksu:335: yasyāṃ yakṣāḥ sitamaṇimayāny etya harmyasthalāni Md_2.5a
GK19meghdksu:336: yasyopānte kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā vardhito me Md_2.15c
GK19meghdksu:338: yācñā moghā varam adhiguṇe nādhame labdhakāmā Md_1.6d
GK19meghdksu:339: yā tatra syād yuvatīviṣaye sṛṣṭir ādyaiva dhātuḥ Md_2.22d
GK19meghdksu:340: yām adhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ Md_2.19d
GK19meghdksu:341: yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāram uccair vimānā Md_1.66c
GK19meghdksu:344: yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te Md_1.15c
GK19meghdksu:347: yo vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śramyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ Md_2.39c
GK19meghdksu:348: raktāśokaś calakisalayaḥ kesaraś cātra kāntaḥ Md_2.18a
GK19meghdksu:354: riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya Md_1.20d
GK19meghdksu:357: revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ Md_1.19c
GK19meghdksu:359: labdhāyās te katham api mayā svapnasandarśaneṣu Md_2.46b
GK19meghdksu:361: lolāpāṅgair yadi na ramase locanair vañcito 'si Md_1.28d
GK19meghdksu:362: vaktuṃ dhīraḥ stanitavacanair māninīṃ prakramethāḥ Md_2.38d
GK19meghdksu:363: vaktracchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ barhabhāreṣu keśān Md_2.44b
GK19meghdksu:364: vakraḥ panthā yadapi bhavataḥ prasthitasyottarāśāṃ Md_1.28a
GK19meghdksu:366: vakṣyasy adhvaśramavinayena tasya śṛṅge niṣaṇṇaḥ Md_1.55c
GK19meghdksu:367: vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu Md_1.12b
GK19meghdksu:370: vācālaṃ māṃ na khalu subhagaṃmanyabhāvaḥ karoti Md_2.34c
GK19meghdksu:372: vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas te sagandhaḥ Md_1.10b
GK19meghdksu:373: vāmaś cāsyāḥ kararuhapadair mucyamāno madīyair Md_2.36a
GK19meghdksu:374: vāsaś citraṃ madhu nayanayor vibhramādeśadakṣaṃ Md_2.12a
GK19meghdksu:375: vitteśānāṃ na ca khalu vayo yauvanād anyad asti Md_2.4d
GK19meghdksu:380: viśrāntaḥ san vraja vananadītīrajānāṃ niṣiñcann Md_1.27a
GK19meghdksu:383: veśyās tvatto nakhapadasukhān prāpya varṣāgrabindūn Md_1.38c
GK19meghdksu:387: śaṅkāspṛṣṭā iva jalamucas tvādṛśā jālamārgair Md_2.8c
GK19meghdksu:388: śaṅke rātrau gurutaraśucaṃ nirvinodāṃ sakhīṃ te Md_2.28b
GK19meghdksu:389: śabdākhyeyaṃ yadapi kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt Md_2.43a
GK19meghdksu:390: śabdāyante madhuram anilaiḥ kīcakāḥ pūryamāṇāḥ Md_1.59a
GK19meghdksu:392: śayyotsaṅge nihitam asakṛd duḥkhaduḥkhena gātram Md_2.33b
GK19meghdksu:393: śaśvat siddhair upacitabaliṃ bhaktinamraḥ parīyāḥ Md_1.58b
GK19meghdksu:395: śāntiṃ neyaṃ praṇayibhir ato vartma bhānos tyajāśu Md_1.42b
GK19meghdksu:398: śāpānto me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau Md_2.50a
GK19meghdksu:404: śṛṅgocchrāyaiḥ kumudaviśadair yo vitatya sthitaḥ khaṃ Md_1.61c
GK19meghdksu:405: śeṣān māsān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā Md_2.50b
GK19meghdksu:407: śeṣaiḥ puṇyair hṛtam iva divaḥ kāntimat khaṇḍam ekam Md_1.31d
GK19meghdksu:409: śailodagrās tvam iva kariṇo vṛṣṭimantaḥ prabhedāt Md_2.13b
GK19meghdksu:416: śroṣyaty asmāt param avahitā saumya sīmantinīnāṃ Md_2.40c
GK19meghdksu:417: sadbhāvārdraḥ phalati na cireṇopakāro mahatsu Md_1.19ad
GK19meghdksu:420: sadyaḥ pāti praṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi Md_1.9d
GK19meghdksu:422: sandeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ Md_1.5b
GK19meghdksu:423: sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai Md_1.4c
GK19meghdksu:425: sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi Md_1.25d
GK19meghdksu:427: sarvāvasthāsv ahar api kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt Md_2.48b
GK19meghdksu:428: savyāpāram ahani na tathā pīḍayed viprayogaḥ Md_2.28a
GK19meghdksu:429: saṃkalpais tair viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ Md_2.42d
GK19meghdksu:431: saṃkṣipyante kṣana iva kathaṃ dīrghayāmā triyāmā Md_2.48a
GK19meghdksu:433: saṃgītārtho nanu paśupates tatra bhāvī samagraḥ Md_1.59d
GK19meghdksu:434: saṃtaptānāṃ tvamasi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ Md_1.7a
GK19meghdksu:435: saṃdeśaṃ me tadanu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam Md_1.13b
GK19meghdksu:438: saṃpatsyante nabhasi bhavato rājahaṃsāḥ sahāyāḥ Md_1.11d
GK19meghdksu:442: saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayāsau Md_1.54c
GK19meghdksu:444: sāntarhāsaṃ kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataś ca tvayā me Md_2.51c
GK19meghdksu:446: sābhre.ahnīva sthalakamalinī na prabhuddhāṃ na suptām Md_2.30d
GK19meghdksu:447: sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam Md_1.21d
GK19meghdksu:448: sā saṃnyastābharaṇam abalā peśalaṃ dhārayantī Md_2.33a
GK19meghdksu:452: sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām Md_2.2d
GK19meghdksu:453: sūryāpāye na khalu kamalaṃ puṣyati svāmabhikhyām Md_2.20d
GK19meghdksu:454: seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ Md_1.10d
GK19meghdksu:459: saudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho mā sma bhūr ujjayinyāḥ Md_1.28b
GK19meghdksu:460: saubhāgyaṃ te subhaga virahāvasthayā vyañjayantī Md_1.30c
GK19meghdksu:461: strīṇām ādyaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ vibhramo hi priyeṣu Md_1.29d
GK19meghdksu:462: sthātavyaṃ te nayanaviṣayaṃ yāvad atyeti bhānuḥ Md_1.37b
GK19meghdksu:463: sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ Md_1.14c
GK19meghdksu:467: snehān āhuḥ kim api virahe dhvaṃsinas te tv abhogād Md_2.52c
GK19meghdksu:470: srotomūrtyā bhuvi pariṇatāṃ rantidevasya kīrtim Md_1.48d
GK19meghdksu:472: svalpībhūte sucaritaphale svargiṇāṃ gāṃ gatānāṃ Md_1.31c
GK19meghdksu:473: hantaikasmin kvacid api na te caṇḍi sādṛśyam asti Md_2.44d
GK19meghdksu:474: harmyeṣv asyāḥ kusumasurabhiṣv adhavakhedaṃ nayethā Md_1.35c
GK19meghdksu:480: hārāṃs tārāṃs taralaguṭikān koṭiśaḥ śaṅkaśuktīḥ Md_1.33a
GK19meghdksu:481: hitvā tasmin bhujagavalayaṃ śambhunā dattahastā Md_1.63a
GK19meghdksu:485: haimaṃ tāladrumavanam abhūd atra tasyaiva rājñaḥ Md_1.34b
